name: Universitat de Lleida
description:
The University of Lleida (UdL)is a public institution with around 10.000 students and 750 teachers. It is an ancient university which was created at the begining of XIV century.

The UdL offers a wide range of studies in the fields of humanities, social sciences, science and engineering. 

The UdL is located in Lleida (Catalonia-Spain). Lleida is the capital of the inland catalan area.
